resources.string: %1$s : You can\u2019t connect to Verizon Wi-Fi Access from outside the Verizon coverage area. (Error = 32760)
%1$s : You are not subscribed to Verizon Wi-Fi Access. Please call us at 800-922-0204. (Error = 32761)
%1$s : There is a problem with your Verizon Wi-Fi Access account. Please call us at 800-922-0204. (Error = 32762)
%1$s : You are already connected to Verizon Wi-Fi Access. (Error = 32763)
%1$s : There is a problem connecting you to Verizon Wi-Fi Access. Please call us at 800-922-0204. (Error = 32764)
%1$s : There is a problem with your Verizon Wi-Fi Access account. Please call us at 800-922-0204. (Error = 32765)
%1$s : Verizon Wi-Fi Access is not available from your location. Try again later or try from a different location. (Error = 32766)
%1$s : There is a problem connecting you to Verizon Wi-Fi Access. Try again later or try from a different location.
%1$s : There is a problem connecting you to Verizon Wi-Fi Access due to error 16384.
%1$s : There is a problem connecting you to Verizon Wi-Fi Access due to error 16385.
%1$s : There is a problem connecting you to Verizon Wi-Fi Access.
